title: What officials may visit
context: ยง353-29 What officials may visit. The governor, lieutenant governor, attorney general, director of finance, director of health, comptroller, judges of all state courts, the ombudsman, the mayors of the counties, members of the legislature, and members of county councils shall be allowed at suitable hours to visit any state correctional facility. [L 1987, c 338, pt of ยง3]
